Turn Off the Lights for the Yomawari Collection's Spooky Launch Trailer
Related Article
paragraph:
Why play one haunting adventure on Halloween when you can play two? If you're in the mood for a spooky double feature, Yomawari: The Long Night Collection—which includes Yomawari: Night Alone and Yomawari: Midnight Shadows—is now available on Switch. NIS America lurched ahead with a leery launch trailer earlier today, so dig in for a sample of the deceptively adorable frights below.    -------Joseph Luster is the Games and Web editor at Otaku USA Magazine.
